urls.title: Qatar Airways Connects Cross-Hemisphere URC and EPCR Club Rugby Competitions to Extend its Diverse Sports Sponsorship Portfolio | Qatar Airways
urls.description: DOHA, Qatar – Qatar Airways announces its newest sport partnership as the Official Airline Partner of the United Rugby Championship (URC), and the Official South African Airline Partner for European Professional Club Rugby. The World’s Best Airline, known for supporting sports globally, has entered into multi-year agreements with the top organisations in club rugby in recognition of the growth and passion demonstrated by rugby fans in key travel markets across Western Europe and South Africa.

data.text:
We are all set to be in the heart of top-flight rugby action 🏉

A new era begins in our partnership with @URCOfficial, @ChampionsCup  & @ChallengeCup_🤝

Rugby fans, coaches, players & officials can now depend on us to cross hemispheres and catch all the action ✈️

#QatarAirways https://t.co/b1L4aHjs2M
